T02D3599:225a-0: @225a * // badzra shrim kha l'a s'a dha na au pa yi ka /
T02D3599:225a-2: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga
T02D3599:225a-3: /'phags ma rdo rje lcags sgrog ma la phyag 'tshal
T02D3599:225a-4: lo // dang por re zhig sngags pas stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste /
T02D3599:225a-5: chos thams cad stong pa nyid do zhes de bzhin du brjod nas /
T02D3599:225a-6: gzhan gang zhig rnams kyang 'dis chos rnams stong pa
T02D3599:225a-7: nyid kyi mthar blta zhing phun sum tshogs par bskyed
T02D3599:225a-8: nas / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D3599:225a-9: de nas ji srid sems can dang sems can gyis
T02D3599:225a-10: bsdus pa rnams yang dag par blangs nas bdag gis
T02D3599:225a-11: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod par bya'o
T02D3599:225a-12: zhes so // de nas snying gar sna tshogs chu skyes /
T02D3599:225a-13: de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D3599:225a-14: de nas h'um yig las skyes pa'i rdo rje lcags
T02D3599:225a-15: sgrog ma'i bdag nyid 'ching ba thams cad gcod pa
T02D3599:225a-16: / gdug pa'i sems can rnams 'dul ba /
T02D3599:225a-17: sku mdog ljang gu zhal gsum pa /
T02D3599:225a-18: spyan gsum gsum pa g-yas pa'i zhal ser skya la spyan ser skya /
T02D3599:225a-19: zhal g-yon pa khro gnyer can /
T02D3599:225a-20: dmar po mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
T02D3599:225a-21: zhal dang po cung zad bzhad pa'o //
T02D3599:225a-22: phyag brgyad pa g-yas kyi dang pos mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa /
T02D3599:225a-24: gsum pa na rdo rje lcags sgrog / bzhi pa na mnga'/
T02D3599:225a-25: g-yon gyi phyag dang po na thod pa khrag gis yongs su gang ba /
T02D3599:225a-29: sangs rgyas kyi sprin tshogs 'phro ba shin tu rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa /
T02D3599:225a-30: byi la'i pags pa'i stod g-yogs byas pa'i rdo rje lcags sgrog ma bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3599:225a-31: skad cig gis byang chub kyang thob na dngos grub gzhan smos ci dgos /
T02D3599:225a-32: aom badzra shrim kha le h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes so //
